name: Advice To A Daughter - LIMITED EDITION BOOK
description:
The book that started it all.

Before 'Real Solutions' there was 'Advice to A Daughter': Abbot Tony's incisive analysis of modern Australian feminism.

Described variously as life changing, kaleidoscopic, lyrical and profound, in Advice to a Daughter, Abbot Tony drops the veil on his previously private views, holding forth on all the big issues  affecting daughters of the Commonwealth. 

When your daughter asks you, what will you say?

Get the advice into your daughter's life today
